resources.string: Keep the display and keyboard at full brightness. If you press the power button, the lock will be implicitly released by the system.
Keep the CPU from going into a standby/low-power mode, even if the power button is pressed or the display times out. If your device has trouble waking up, this is the lock you want.
Keep the screen on, but allow it to dim. If you press the power button, the lock will be implicitly released by the system.
Keep the screen at full brightness. If you press the power button, the lock will be implicitly released by the system.
Wi-Fi will stay active and behave normally, performance and loss will depend on other factors, e.g. whether the screen is off.
Wi-Fi will stay active and in high-performance mode even if the screen is off.
When the phone goes into standby, Wi-Fi will be kept active but only scans are allowed.
Known to fix Galaxy Note 4 issues
Acquire the configured locks automatically after reboots.
You can manually resume the locks by pressing play.
Locks are paused because the option to only acquire them during calls is enabled.
This app allows you to manually acquire a \'wakelock\' which influences device power management by keeping components from going into standby.
This app does not detect or release wakelocks from other apps. It will most likely not improve your battery life.
After surviving Android for over 6 years this app deserved a little overhaul. If you don\'t like the redesign you can switch to the legacy version.
The guy who wrote this app.
What happens with your data (hint: nothing).
What keeps the developer awake at night? Your coffee and Samsung\'s bugs.
Contrary to popular opinion developers do actually need to buy food too :). With onions, mushrooms and salami please.
